introduction: Squash Blossom is another name for a pumpkin flower. The word "squash" dictionary means "crush or squeeze (something) with force." This film shows the personal experience of the filmmaker from two perspectives. In the process of transferring and editing the images of two events recorded with a home video camera at a specific time of the filmmaker's family, when her younger sister was preparing for the college entrance exam as a dance major, to 16mm film are a continuous conflict of image, emotions, and memories. As a dance film, this film explores to show visually the inspiration of dance choreography and the dancer's expression of self-reflection.
